YouTube: Watch, Listen, Stream:
Data Used to Track You:
The app introduced a tracking category that utilizes contact information such as physical addresses, phone numbers, and email, alongside device and user identifiers.

Data Linked to You:
The app expanded its collection of contact details for advertising purposes, while search history was removed from the data types used for app functionality.
Brave Private Web Browser, VPN: No changes in data collection or usage.
Dog Selfie Camera:
Data Used to Track You:
The developer uses your User ID and Device ID to track your activity across apps and websites owned by other companies.

Data Linked to You:
Device identifiers are collected and linked to your identity to support advertising, analytics, and core app functions.

Data Not Linked to You:
The app collects user identifiers for marketing, personalization, and analytics, but this data is not tied to your specific identity.
Color Block Jam: No changes in data collection or usage.
